H0.text: Wind is the major cause of ocean waves.

H1.text: Moon's gravity is the major cause of ocean waves.

H2.text: Salinity is the major cause of ocean waves.

H3.text: Earth's rotation is the major cause of ocean waves.

A4.text: Wind must be moving faster than the wave crest for energy transfer to the wave.

A5.text: The great majority of large breakers seen at a beach result from distant winds.
